dishes.name: Phở
dishes.description: A Vietnamese soup consisting of broth, rice noodles, herbs, and either beef or chicken. A popular breakfast dish in Vietnam, served with various toppings and sauces.

dishes.name: Bánh mì
dishes.description: A Vietnamese sandwich typically made with a baguette, pâté, various meats, pickled vegetables, cilantro, and mayonnaise.

dishes.name: Bún chả
dishes.description: A dish originating in Hanoi, featuring grilled pork, rice noodles, and fresh herbs, served with a dipping sauce made from fish sauce, sugar, and lime.

dishes.name: Cơm tấm
dishes.description: Broken rice served with grilled pork, pickled vegetables, a fried egg, and a dipping sauce made from fish sauce, sugar, and lime.

dishes.name: Bánh xèo
dishes.description: A crispy Vietnamese pancake made from rice flour, turmeric, and coconut milk, filled with pork, shrimp, bean sprouts, and herbs, served with a dipping sauce.

dishes.name: Gỏi cuốn
dishes.description: Vietnamese spring rolls made from rice paper, filled with shrimp, pork, rice noodles, and fresh herbs, served with a peanut dipping sauce.

dishes.name: Cá kho tộ
dishes.description: A clay pot dish featuring fish braised in a caramelized sauce with garlic, shallots, and fish sauce, typically served with steamed rice.

dishes.name: Chả giò
dishes.description: Crispy Vietnamese egg rolls filled with ground pork, shrimp, glass noodles, and vegetables, served with a dipping sauce.

dishes.name: Bún bò Huế
dishes.description: A spicy beef noodle soup from the city of Huế, featuring lemongrass, annatto seeds, and thick rice noodles, garnished with herbs and vegetables.

dishes.name: Bánh cuốn
dishes.description: Steamed rice rolls filled with ground pork, mushrooms, and shallots, topped with fried shallots and fresh herbs, served with a dipping sauce.

dishes.name: Mì Quảng
dishes.description: A noodle dish from Quảng Nam Province, featuring rice noodles, shrimp, pork, quail eggs, and various herbs, topped with crushed peanuts and rice crackers, served with a flavorful broth.

dishes.name: Bánh khọt
dishes.description: Small, crispy rice flour pancakes topped with shrimp, green onions, and coconut milk, served with a dipping sauce and fresh herbs.

dishes.name: Cánh gà chiên nước mắm
dishes.description: Chicken wings marinated in a mixture of fish sauce, sugar, and spices, then deep-fried until crispy and golden, served with a dipping sauce.

dishes.name: Bò lúc lắc
dishes.description: A Vietnamese stir-fry dish made with cubed beef, onions, peppers, and tomatoes, served over a bed of greens and often accompanied by steamed rice.

dishes.name: Cơm gà Hội An
dishes.description: A Hoi An specialty featuring shredded chicken and rice cooked in chicken broth and turmeric, served with pickled vegetables, fresh herbs, and a dipping sauce.

dishes.name: Bánh canh
dishes.description: A Vietnamese soup made with thick tapioca noodles and a choice of toppings, such as crab, shrimp, or pork, served in a rich, flavorful broth.

dishes.name: Bún riêu
dishes.description: A rice noodle soup featuring crab meat, tomatoes, and tofu, served in a tamarind-infused broth, garnished with fresh herbs and vegetables.

dishes.name: Bánh bột chiên
dishes.description: A Vietnamese street food made from fried rice flour cakes, eggs, and vegetables, served with a dipping sauce.

dishes.name: Bánh mì chảo
dishes.description: A Vietnamese breakfast dish consisting of a small baguette served with an assortment of meats, pâté, fried eggs, and pickled vegetables.

dishes.name: Xôi
dishes.description: A sticky rice dish often served with various toppings such as mung beans, coconut, sesame seeds, or meat, typically enjoyed for breakfast or as a snack.

dishes.name: Bún thịt nướng
dishes.description: A Vietnamese dish made with grilled marinated pork, rice noodles, fresh herbs, and pickled vegetables, served with a fish sauce-based dipping sauce.

dishes.name: Cháo
dishes.description: A Vietnamese rice porridge typically cooked with water or broth and flavored with various ingredients such as chicken, fish, or pork, served with fresh herbs and condiments.

dishes.name: Bánh bèo
dishes.description: Small, steamed rice cakes topped with dried shrimp, fried shallots, and scallions, served with a fish sauce-based dipping sauce.

dishes.name: Gà nướng sả
dishes.description: Grilled chicken marinated in a lemongrass-infused mixture, served with a side of rice, fresh herbs, and a dipping sauce.

dishes.name: Bánh ít
dishes.description: Steamed glutinous rice dumplings filled with sweet or savory ingredients, such as mung bean paste or a mixture of pork and shrimp, wrapped in banana leaves.

dishes.name: Bún ốc
dishes.description: A snail-based soup featuring rice noodles, tomatoes, and various herbs, served with a flavorful broth.

dishes.name: Bánh mì xíu mại
dishes.description: A Vietnamese breakfast dish consisting of a baguette served with xíu mại (pork meatballs) cooked in a tomato-based sauce.

dishes.name: Cơm cháy
dishes.description: Crispy rice crackers often served as a snack or used as a garnish in various dishes, sometimes flavored with ingredients like garlic or chili.

dishes.name: Bánh dầy
dishes.description: A round, thick Vietnamese rice cake made from glutinous rice, often enjoyed as a snack or used as an ingredient in other dishes.

dishes.name: Bánh tẻ
dishes.description: Steamed glutinous rice cakes filled with mung bean paste and pork, wrapped in banana leaves, typically enjoyed during special occasions or as a snack.

dishes.name: Bánh chưng
dishes.description: A traditional Vietnamese rice cake made from glutinous rice, mung bean, and pork, wrapped in banana leaves and steamed for several hours, typically prepared for Tết (Vietnamese New Year).

dishes.name: Bánh hỏi
dishes.description: Thin rice vermicelli woven into intricate bundles, typically served with grilled meat, fresh herbs, and a dipping sauce.

dishes.name: Bánh tôm
dishes.description: A Vietnamese shrimp fritter made from sweet potato, shrimp, and rice flour, deep-fried until crispy and golden, served with a dipping sauce.

dishes.name: Cơm cá
dishes.description: A dish made from rice cooked with fish, often seasoned with turmeric, dill, and other spices, served with fresh herbs and a dipping sauce.

dishes.name: Nộm
dishes.description: A Vietnamese salad made from shredded vegetables, such as green papaya, carrot, or cabbage, mixed with herbs, crushed peanuts, and a tangy dressing made from fish sauce, lime, and sugar.

dishes.name: Bánh bột lọc
dishes.description: A transparent Vietnamese dumpling made from tapioca flour, filled with shrimp and pork, and wrapped in banana leaves, typically served with a fish sauce-based dipping sauce.

dishes.name: Bánh phồng tôm
dishes.description: Vietnamese shrimp chips made from tapioca flour and shrimp, deep-fried until puffed and crispy, often served as a snack or a side dish.

dishes.name: Bánh khoai mì
dishes.description: A Vietnamese dessert made from grated cassava, sugar, and coconut milk, baked until golden and slightly chewy, often served warm.

dishes.name: Chè
dishes.description: A variety of Vietnamese sweet soups or puddings, often made with ingredients such as beans, tapioca, fruit, and coconut milk, served hot or cold.

dishes.name: Bánh da lợn

dishes.name: Bánh cáy
dishes.description: A deep-fried Vietnamese rice cake, crispy on the outside and chewy on the inside, typically filled with mung bean paste, coconut, or sesame seeds.

dishes.name: Bánh tráng nướng

dishes.name: Bánh dừa

dishes.name: Bánh tét

dishes.name: Chả lụa

dishes.name: Bánh đúc

dishes.name: Bánh rán

dishes.description: A Vietnamese dish made from rice paper rolls filled with various ingredients, such as grilled meat, vegetables, herbs, and vermicelli noodles, served with a dipping sauce.

dishes.name: Bánh phu thê

dishes.name: Bánh trôi

dishes.name: Bánh xèo
